April 20, 1980 D Lansing Bagnall (Challenge Contest)
Lansing Bagnall (Challenge Contest) 20 Test Piece Contest Lansing Bagnall lansing-bagnall-challenge-contest
None
Concert Overture for Brass Band
Lansing Bagnall Social Centre, Houndmills Road, Basingstoke Prizes - 1st £250 and trophy, 2nd £150 and trophy, 3rd £75 and trophy. Open to 2nd section bands. 4th annual contest. 8 bands competed.
Oct. 7, 2013, 4:18 p.m. May 5, 2017, 1:06 p.m.
1 Welwyn Garden City Band David Baron
2 Coventry Imperial Geoffrey Barber
3 Otterbourne Brass John Knight
4 Shirland Welfare Band Doug Carlin
5 City of Oxford Silver Band Don Keene
7 Tadley Band Gordon Saunders
8 Corsham Band Ian Dickinson
Withdrawn A. W. Parker (Drybrook) Band Unknown
Withdrawn Horsham Borough Unknown
